content: Thin metal reciprocating saw blades (heavy-duty) Longer-lasting reciprocating saw blade for cutting 2-6 mm (1/16 - 1/4) thick metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful, durable bimetal blades optimized for cutting thin metal plates, thin-walled metal pipes, tubing, struts etc. Increased width and thickness – the ideal blade for when you need precise, straight cuts Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Cleaner cuts through thin metal components (2-6 mm or 1/16 - 1/4) Cutting thin metal plate Cutting pipes and tubing Cutting strut ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 18 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 18 | Blade features | Long life, Heavy duty ### ITEMS- 2179715 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 18 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179714 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 18 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2179724 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 18 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179723 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 18 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 3938298 - Recip Bld SP 23 18 (50) 2 for 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x Recip. saw blade SP 9 18 (50) metal
